alert.note: Alert for St Croix; St.Thomas...St. John.. and Adjacent Islands (Virgin Islands) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 17 at 9:45AM AST until August 17 at 5:00PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat index values of 108 to 112 degrees Fahrenheit. * WHERE...Vieques and the US Virgin Islands. * WHEN...through 5 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion is possible with prolonged exposure. Heat stroke possible.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions, if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water.

area.areaDesc: St Croix; St.Thomas...St. John.. and Adjacent Islands
